data.author: Young Strategies Limited

changelog.release_notes: Added pebble time support rather than just pebble time round.

data.description:
Bit of fun, displays the time and date using the Harry Potter font. Give the watch a shake and see a surprise....

The sky turns red when bluetooth is not connected.

Disclaimer:

This is an unofficial trivia app, made by fans for fans, and is not affiliated with, sponsored or endorsed by J.K. Rowling, Bloomsbury Publishing, or Warner Bros. or their affiliates in any way. All related intellectual property rights are the property of their respective owners. This app is intended for educational and information use only.

Harry Potter Series is based on J.K Rowling Books.

The Harry Potter font used is from here http://www.dafont.com/harry-p.font

The dragon animation (spoilt the surprise...) is from here http://bestanimations.com/Fantasy/Dragons/Dragons.html

latest_release.release_notes: Added pebble time support rather than just pebble time round.

data.title: Hogwarts Big Clock
